title: To start the APU, 1. Check that APU FAIL switch is not illum…
caption_en: To start the APU, 1. Check that APU FAIL switch is not illuminated. If it is illuminated, call for maintenance action. The APU cannot be started with this light on. pop rea am Ee 7 wri

title: Select the APU Master switch on. The ON light will be illumi…
caption_en: Select the APU Master switch on. The ON light will be illuminated. This action electrically powers the ECU. a rea am Ee 7 wri

title: Next, select the STARTSTOP switch. Both the APU inlet and ex…
caption_en: Next, select the STARTSTOP switch. Both the APU inlet and exhaust doors will open. Then, the START light will illuminate as the APU starter engages and its starting cycle is monitored by the ECU. a rea am Ee 7 wri

title: When the APU reaches 95 rpm, -the START light will extinguis…
caption_en: When the APU reaches 95 rpm, -the START light will extinguish and - the green RUN light will illuminate. This means that both electrical and pneumatic loads are now available. The APU will accelerate to and stabilizes at pm. ew rea am Ee 7 wri

title: Above 95 rpm, the APU electrical power is available when the…
caption_en: Above 95 rpm, the APU electrical power is available when the AVAIL light is illuminated on the APU GEN switch. The GEN AMPS indicator will also display the actual electrical load with a maximum load of amps. However, during APU starting, it will indicate 0 amps. regen) rea am Ee 7 wri

title: The APU bleed air is selected via the APU Bleed switch. When…
caption_en: The APU bleed air is selected via the APU Bleed switch. When selected, the ON light on the APU BLEED switch will illuminate. pony rea am Ee 7 wri

title: The APU fire switch is a guarded switch. If there is an APU …
caption_en: The APU fire switch is a guarded switch. If there is an APU fire, the fire warning system will activate and the switch will light up. The warming CAS message APU FIRE is aiso displayed. pegs rea am Ee 7 wri

title: The ECU then shuts down the A-P-U and the RUN light will ext…
caption_en: The ECU then shuts down the A-P-U and the RUN light will extinguish. The APU FAIL light will then illuminate. po rea am Ee 7 wri

title: To extinguish the fire, lift up the guard and depress the FI…
caption_en: To extinguish the fire, lift up the guard and depress the FIRE switch. This will discharge the APU fire extinguisher bottle contents into the APU enclosure. por rea am Ee 7 wri

title: To manually shut down the APU, regen) rea am Ee 7 wri
caption_en: To manually shut down the APU, regen) rea am Ee 7 wri

title: The APU will then begin it shutdown cycle. 5. After the APU …
caption_en: The APU will then begin it shutdown cycle. 5. After the APU has shut down, the ECU is still powered. If the APU is no longer required, place the APU MASTER switch off and the ON light will extinguish. pony rea am Ee 7 wri
